code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import sessionReducer from"./session";import productsReducer from"./products";var rootReducer=combineReducers({session:sessionReducer,productState:productsReducer});var enhancer;if(process.env.NODE_ENV==="production"){enhancer=applyMiddleware(thunk);}else{var logger=require("redux-logger").default;var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));}var configureStore=function configureStore(preloadedState){return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,enhancer);};export default configureStore;
